name: Stranger Breakdown
description:
Based on the theme of the gaming jam Stranger jam, and also taking a bit of inspiration from a hex jam I seen.
In this game you have to get away from your broken down car and back to the safe house but be careful not to step on the wrong tiles as the people in the safe-house headset traps or around the area to protect them from the monsters which approach.
Every time you die the colours on the player are randomly generated.

How to play:
    Roll the dice to see your odds out of 18 of stepping on a trap.
    Tiles you stepped on before which were safe will be safe for the next time you step on them.
    Head North to the house.

Things I would like to add to the game but didn't have time:
    Add sounds to add a spooky and airy feeling.
    Add a limited amount of lives.
    Add more detail to the models.
    Add Monsters as well as traps.
    Add a more advanced dice mechanics system, that allows for Shields and double moves.
